mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( attendance_id, emp_loginId, record_date, check_in_time, status, created_at ) VALUES ( attendance_seq.nextval, #{emp_loginId}, #{record_date}, #{check_in_time}, '출근', SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET check_out_time = #{check_out_time}, work_hours = #{work_hours}, overtime_hours = #{overtime_hours}, status = '퇴근' WHERE emp_loginId = #{emp_loginId} AND TRUNC(record_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(check_in_time) FROM attendance WHERE emp_loginId = #{userId} AND TRUNC(record_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT check_out_time FROM ( SELECT check_out_time FROM attendance WHERE emp_loginId = #{emp_loginId} AND TRUNC(record_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY created_at DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT attendance_id FROM ( SELECT attendance_id FROM attendance WHERE emp_loginId = #{emp_loginId} AND TRUNC(record_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY created_at DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity ( activity_id, attendance_id, activity_type, start_time, end_time, activity_hours ) VALUES ( activity_seq.NEXTVAL, #{attendance_id}, #{activity_type}, #{start_time}, #{end_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activity_hours} )
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET end_time = SYSDATE WHERE attendance_id = #{attendance_id} AND end_time IS NULL
